refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets the view direction for MGED from the quaternion specified on the command line.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Sets the view direction for MGED from the quaternion specified on the command line.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the orientation command to set the view direction for MGED from the specified quaternion.

example.title: Set the view direction for MGED.
example.para: Sets the viewing direction to bottom.
